column2: Administrative Measures Adopted by the Government and the Monetary Board during the Year

column1: For the purpose of this Order -
“Act” means the Foreign Exchange Act, No. 12 of 2017;
“authorized dealer” shall have the same meaning as in the Foreign Exchange Act, No. 12 of 2017;
“person” shall have the same meaning as in the Foreign Exchange Act, No. 12 of 2017;
“resident in Sri Lanka” shall have the same meaning in terms of the Order issued under Section 31 of the Foreign Exchange Act,
No. 12 of 2017 as published in the Gazette (Extraordinary) Notification No. 2213/40 dated 03.02.2021, as amended.
